item.title: Sabbatical
item.description: So, I’ve wrapped up work in Sydney, and took a single flight Sydney -> Wellington on April 28th! The next 12 months I’ll enjoy my first sabbatical and I’m excited! My biggest fear is wasting my time and realising the year is over and feel like I did not use the time wisely. How many people are blessed enough to have a year off? After spending a few months wrapping up work, talking to friends and making a list of things I want to accomplish.
